remember.title: Buyisa Iphasiwedi
remember.success: Imiyalelo yokusetha kabusha iphasiwedi ithunyelwe ku-imeyili yakho.
remember.error: Iphutha ekuthumeleni imiyalelo. Sicela uzame futhi.
remember.fillFields: Sicela ugcwalise inkambu ye-imeyili ukuze uqhubeke.

terms.label: Ngifunde futhi ngivumelana nemigomo yokusebenzisa kanye nenqubomgomo yobumfihlo
terms.required: Kumele uvumele imigomo yokusebenzisa kanye nenqubomgomo yobumfihlo

logo.title: Save Money
logo.subtitle: Ubuchwepheshe be-PUC Minas
logo.ariaLabel: Ilogo ye-Save Money Ubuchwepheshe be-PUC Minas

hero.title: Lawula Izimali Zakho Ngobuhlakani
hero.description: I-SaveMoney iyisixazululo esiphelele sokulawula izindleko, ukonga kanye nokufeza izinhloso zakho zezimali.

financialControl.title: Ukulawula Kwezimali
financialControl.description: Landela imali yakho engenayo kanye nezindleko ngesikhathi sangempela ngokuhlukanisa ngokuzenzakalelayo kanye nemibiko enemininingwane.

reports.title: Imibiko Enemininingwane
reports.description: Buka amagrafu kanye nemibiko ekusiza ukuba uqonde kangcono imikhuba yakho yezimali.

savings.title: Izinhloso Zokonga
savings.description: Setha izinhloso zakho zokonga bese ulandela inqubekelaphambili yakho usebenzisa amathuluzi aqondile.

user1.quote: I-SaveMoney ishintshe ngokuphelele indlela engibheka ngayo imali. Manje ngiyakwazi ukonga nokutshala imali ngenkolelo enkulu.
user1.name: Nokwanda Dlamini

user2.quote: I-interface iqondile futhi imibiko iyasiza kakhulu. Ngiyayincoma kubo bonke abafuna ukulawula kangcono izimali zabo.
user2.name: Sipho Mkhize

cta.title: Qala Ukonga Namhlanje
cta.description: Joyina izinkulungwane zabasebenzisi abasebevele bashintsha impilo yabo yezimali nge-SaveMoney.

recurring.title: Izinto Eziphindaphindayo
recurring.description: Unezinto eziphindaphindayo ezithinta isamba sakho sezimali
recurring.info: Amanani alinganiselwe afaka izinto eziphindaphindayo ezizophenduka ngokuzenzakalelayo ezikhathini ezizayo

empty.title: Wamukelekile ku-SaveMoney!
empty.description: Qala ukulawula izimali zakho ngokwengeza ukutshalwa kwezimali, imali engenayo kanye nezindleko zakho.

contact.title: Xhumana
contact.description: Unemibuzo, iziphakamiso noma udinga usizo? Xhumana nathi ngefomu elingezansi noma usebenzise enye yezindlela zethu zokuxhasa.

form.success: Umlayezo uthunyelwe ngempumelelo! Sizokuxhumana nawe maduze.
form.error: Kube nempazamo ekuthumeleni umlayezo. Sicela uzame futhi.

mission.title: Umsebenzi Wethu
mission.description: I-SaveMoney iwuhlelo lwe-web olusha oluhlose ukuguqula indlela yokulawula izimali zomuntu siqu. Umsebenzi wethu ukusiza abantu ukuthi benze izinqumo ezihlakaniphile ngezimali nokufeza izinhloso zabo ngokusebenzisa amathuluzi ezimali ahlakaniphile nokulula ukuwasebenzisa.

financialControl.title: UkuLawula Kwezimali
financialControl.description: Lawula izimali zakho ngokuphelele ngokusebenzisa izigaba ezikhethekile nemibiko enemininingwane.

investments.title: Ukutshalwa Kwezimali
investments.description: Landela futhi ukhulise ukutshalwa kwezimali zakho ngokusebenzisa amathuluzi okuhlaziya athuthukile.

currencyConverter.title: Iguquli Yemali
currencyConverter.description: Guqula izimali ezahlukahlukene ngokushesha ngokusebenzisa amanani emali anamuhla.

teamContact.title: Ukuxhumana Neqembu
teamContact.description: Xhumana ngqo neqembu lokusekela ukuze uthole usizo.

personalAccount.title: I-akhawunti Yomuntu Siqu
personalAccount.description: Lawula izimali zakho zomuntu siqu ngokulula nokuphepha.

businessAccount.title: I-akhawunti Yebhizinisi
businessAccount.description: Hlinzeka ngezixazululo ezimali eziphelele ezamabhizinisi amancane namaphakathi.

multipleLanguages.title: Izilimi Eziningi
multipleLanguages.description: Isikhombisi esinezilimi eziningi esisekela abasebenzisi abavela emazweni ahlukahlukene.

cryptocurrencies.title: Izimali Ze-Cryptocurrency
cryptocurrencies.description: Lawula futhi ulandele ukutshalwa kwezimali zakho ze-cryptocurrency.

team.title: Iqembu Lethu
team.description: Iqembu lethu labathuthukisi abanethalente futhi abanentshisekelo eliphezulu lisebenza ukwakha isipiliyoni sezimali esingcono kakhulu.
team.description1: Save Money is developed by a dedicated team of students from the Analysis and Systems Development - Distance Learning course at PUC Minas.
team.description2: Our team combines technical expertise with a passion for innovation to create a complete and accessible financial solution.

puc.title: I-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais
puc.description: I-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais iyisikhungo esidumile semfundo ephakeme esaziwa ngokugqama kwayo kwezemfundo nokucwaninga. Kule ndawo ekhethekile, kuqalwe iphrojekthi ye-Save Money, uhlelo olusha oluhlose ukwenza ngcono ukuphathwa kwezimali zomuntu siqu. Ukusekelwa kwabafundisi kanye nabantu abasebenza ezemfundo kubalulekile ekuthuthukisweni kwephrojekthi, benikeza ukuhola kanye nezeluleko ezidingekayo ukuze iphumelele.

walmor.name: UDom Walmor Oliveira de Azevedo
walmor.description: Ozalelwe eCocos (Bahia), uDom Walmor Oliveira de Azevedo ungumongameli we-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais kanye noMbhishobhi Omkhulu wase-Belo Horizonte, futhi ungumongameli we-Brazilian Episcopal Conference (CNBB). Uneziqu ze-PhD ku-Biblical Theology e-University yase-Pontifical Gregorian (Roma, Italy) kanye ne-Master's Degree ku-Biblical Sciences e-Pontifical Biblical Institute (Roma, Italy).

luis.name: UDkt. ULuis Henrique Eloy e Silva
luis.description: Uneziqu ze-PhD kanye ne-Master's Degree ku-Biblical Sciences e-Pontifical Biblical Institute kanye ne-Bachelor's Degree ku-Theology e-University yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Rio de Janeiro. Waqeda izifundo zakhe ze-postdoctoral e-Theological Faculty yase-Ludwig-Maximilian University yase-Munich, eJalimane.

joyce.name: UJoyce Christina de Paiva Carvalho
joyce.description: Unguthisha kanye nomqondisi we-CST we-Systems Analysis and Development-EaD e-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais. Unolwazi oluningi ezobuchwepheshe bezolwazi, futhi unguthisha osezingeni lesine e-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais. Izindawo zakhe zokucwaninga zifaka i-databases, i-business intelligence, ukuhlaziya kanye nemidwebo, egxile ekuthuthukisweni kwesoftware.

humberto.name: UHumberto Azevedo Negri do Carmo
humberto.description: Uthisha oneminyaka engu-17 yokufundisa kanye neminyaka engu-37 yokuthuthukisa izinhlelo kanye nesoftware, osebenze e-CEFET-MG, PUC-MG, Newton Paiva kanye ne-UNA. Izindawo zakhe zobuchwepheshe zifaka izilimi zokuhlela, izinhlelo zolwazi, ubunjiniyela besoftware kanye nobunjiniyela. Ufunda nokwakhiwa kwekhompyutha.

aline.name: UAline Luciana Cândido
aline.description: Umsizi wezemfundo, osekela abafundi kanye nezinqubo ze-ADS EaD course e-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais.

ana.name: UAna Flávia Patrício de Barros
ana.description: Ophethe ukusekelwa kwezemfundo kanye nezinsizakalo zabafundi ze-ADS EaD course.

camila.name: UCamila Cristina Gonçalves Marques de Moura
camila.description: Ophethe ukusekelwa kwezokuphatha kanye nezemfundo ze-ADS EaD course.

gabriela.name: UGabriela Araújo Batista
gabriela.description: Osiza imisebenzi yansuku zonke yezemfundo kanye nothisha be-ADS EaD course.

vanilda.name: UVanilda da Conceição de Oliveira
vanilda.description: Osekela ukuphathwa kwezemfundo kanye nezinsizakalo zabafundi ze-ADS EaD course.

lucila.name: ULucila Ishiyuka
lucila.description: Uneziqu ze-PhD ku-Computer Science e-UFMG, osebenza e-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais ezifundweni ze-postgraduate ze-computer science kanye nezifundo ze-computer, izintshisekelo zakhe zokucwaninga zifaka imfundo, ukwakhelwa kokusebenzisa umsebenzisi kanye nemidlalo yezemfundo.

maria.name: UMaria Augusta Vieira Nelson
maria.description: Uneziqu ze-PhD ku-Computer Science e-University of Waterloo, unguthisha kanye nomqondisi wezifundo ze-Software Engineering e-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais, onolwazi oluningi ekufundiseni, ekucwaningeni kanye nasezindaweni, egxile ekuthuthukisweni kwesoftware.

jane.name: UJane Carmelita das Dores Galvão de Aruda Barroso
jane.description: Uneziqu ze-Master's ku-Mathematics Education, ofundisa i-calculus kwezobuchwepheshe kanye nezobunjiniyela e-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais, futhi uhlanganyela nokuhlola kanye namaphrojekthi e-university extension.

zulka.name: UZulka Iyalle Moreira Ferreira
zulka.description: Isebenza kakhulu ezinhlelweni zomthetho e-Minas Gerais. Isebenza ne-Santander Bank S.A.

livia.name: ULivia Borges Pádua
livia.description: Uneziqu ze-Master's ku-Communication e-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais (2009) futhi uhlobene ne-College of Communication and Arts (FCA).

rodrigo.name: URodrigo Richard Gomes
rodrigo.description: Uneziqu ze-PhD ku-Bioinformatics e-UFMG, uqondisa izifundo ze-Information Systems kanye ne-Data Science specialization e-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais, onolwazi oluningi ezobuchwepheshe kanye nomculo.

rommel.name: URommel Vieira Carneiro
rommel.description: Uneziqu ze-Master's ku-Computer Science e-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais, ungumqondisi kanye nothisha wezifundo ze-Computer, onolwazi oluningi ekuphathweni kwephrojekthi kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwesoftware.

bernardo.name: UBernardo Jeunon de Almeida
bernardo.description: Uneziqu ze-PhD ku-Spatial Information Processing, unguthisha kanye nomqondisi wezifundo ze-Information Systems e-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais, onolwazi oluningi kwezobunjiniyela kagesi, izibalo kanye nokucwaninga kwezindawo.

silvio.name: USilvio Jamil Ferzoli Guimarães
silvio.description: Uneziqu ze-PhD ku-Computer Science e-UFMG, unguthisha kanye nomcwaningi e-University Yase-Pontifical Catholic yase-Minas Gerais, egxile ekucubungulweni kwemifanekiso, amavidiyo kanye nokutholwa kolwazi.

henrique.name: UHenrique Maia Veloso
henrique.description: Uneziqu ze-PhD ku-Management e-USP, uthisha kanye umeluleki, onolwazi oluningi ekuphathweni, ekucwaningeni kanye nemfundo ephakeme, ocwaninga izihloko ezifana nokucindezeleka emsebenzini kanye nobunikazi.

raquel.name: Raquel Alves Furtado
raquel.description: PhD and Master in Administration, with an MBA in HR and a bachelor's in Social Communication. Professor at PUC Minas since 2002, working in Human Resources, Communication, Marketing, and Entrepreneurship. Manager of the PUC Carreiras project, certified coach, and researcher, with over 30 years of experience as a manager, consultant, and author of scientific articles.

validation.title: Isihloko siyadingeka.
validation.endDate: Usuku lokuqeda kumele lube ngemva kosuku lokuqala.
validation.interestRate: Izinga lenzuzo kumele libe likhulu kune-0.

confirmDelete.message: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa lokhu kutshalwa kwezimali?

confirmDelete.title: Susa imali engenayo
confirmDelete.message: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa le mali engenayo?

errors.load: Iphutha ekulayisheni izindleko. Sicela uzame futhi.
errors.save: Iphutha ekulondolozweni kwendleko. Sicela uzame futhi.
errors.delete: Iphutha ekususeni indleko. Sicela uzame futhi.
errors.markPaid: Iphutha ekubuyekezweni kwesimo sokukhokha. Sicela uzame futhi.
errors.markRecurringPaid: Iphutha ekubuyekezweni kwesimo sokukhokha esibuyelayo. Sicela uzame futhi.

confirmDelete.title: Susa indleko
confirmDelete.message: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa le ndleko?

notFound.title: Ikhasi Alitholakali
notFound.description: Ikhasi ozama ukulifinyelela alikho noma lisuswe.
notFound.notAuthDescription:
Hhayi! Kubonakala sengathi ulahlekile.
Ikhasi olifunayo alikho noma lihanjiswe.

logout.title: Phuma
logout.message: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukuphuma? Uzodinga ukungena futhi ukuze ufinyelele ohlelweni.

deleteAccount.title: Susa I-akhawunti
deleteAccount.message: Uma ususa i-akhawunti, yonke idatha yakho yomuntu siqu kanye nemininingwane izosuswa unomphela ohlelweni, okuhlanganisa:

lgpd.title: Ulwazi Lokuvikela Idatha:
lgpd.message: Ngokomthetho Wokuvikela Ulwazi Lwabantu Siqu (POPIA) waseNingizimu Afrika, unelungelo lokucela ukususwa kwedatha yakho yomuntu siqu. Ngokugcina lesi senzo, usebenzisa leli lungelo, futhi yonke idatha yakho izosuswa unomphela ezinhlelweni zethu.

converter.title: I-Currency Converter
converter.description: Guqula amanani phakathi kwezimali ezahlukene usebenzisa amanani okushintshana asesikhathini sangempela. I-converter yethu isebenzisa idatha enembile ukuqinisekisa isipiliyoni esihle kakhulu.

rates.title: Amanani Avuselelwe
rates.description: Amanani ethu okushintshana avuselelwa ngesikhathi sangempela, aqinisekisa ukunemba kwezinguquko zakho.

currencies.title: Izimali Eziningi
currencies.description: Ukusekelwa kwezimali ezahlukene zamazwe ngamazwe, kufaka phakathi ama-cryptocurrency adumile.

history.title: Umlando
history.description: Landela umlando wezinguquko zakho ukuze uzibhekele esikhathini esizayo.

endDate.label: Usuku Lokuqeda
endDate.error: Usuku lokuqeda kumele lube ngemva kosuku lokuqala

empty.title: Ayikho idatha etholakele
empty.description: Ayikho idatha yokwakha imibiko. Engeza imali engenayo, izindleko noma izimali ezibekelwe ukuze uqale.
